channel.title: followHandler - Dont walk through objects?
channel.description: Anyone got a followHandler/Follow code that doesn't allow you to walk through walls or objects when you're following someone? Mine lets you take the shortest root to get to the player you're following, so it just cuts through anything to get to their absx and absy.

item.title: followHandler - Dont walk through objects?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“monkey money30, post:1, topic:233278”]it does depend on what client you have if it’s silab you cant have follow handler if you have client
go to hydrascape.net
and download the client and then ask a player named tazo he will tell you how to do it.
i hope i helped a bit ;D[/quote]really? then how come the only client I’ve used is silab, yet i got follow to work. (besides the fact you walk through walls)

Read full topic

Anyone got a followHandler/Follow code that doesn’t allow you to walk through walls or objects when you’re following someone? Mine lets you take the shortest root to get to the player you’re following, so it just cuts through anything to get to their absx and absy.
